name: Of Potatoes And Humans
description:
"I hope these words of mine reach you." In the first age, when the Universe was as young as a child, when the stars were born from the eternal space dust, and when there was no such thing as the Earth, it appeared.

This is a very short visual novel about a god and its world. A friend of mine (he goes by Herr Delinquent) wrote the story as an inside joke to a Hello Charlotte discord server; I, naturally, loved it—so here we are.

Warning! This game contains a scene that has a bit of body horror.
